Hero.name: Moaaz Ahmed
Hero.description: Cloud Engineer in Training (AWS re/START) | Software Developer - React, Node, JavaScript, C++ | M.Tech IT – NSUT Delhi | Ex-Publicis Sapient

ServiceSection.description: Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience in full-stack development (React.js, Node.js, RESTful APIs) and cloud computing (AWS EC2, S3, IAM, VPC, Linux). Skilled in troubleshooting, microservices, and problem-solving. Currently pursuing AWS re/START and seeking a Cloud Support or Software Engineer role.

items.title: Software Developer | Publicis Sapient
responsibilities: Managed troubleshooting and resolving post-deployment issues (L3 support) across multiple markets, reducing bug turnaround time by 30%.
Developed and maintained full-stack features for Nestlé brand portals, handling frontend interfaces and backend integrations.
Designed and consumed RESTful APIs, managed JSON data mapping, error handling, and JWT-based authentication.
Built responsive UI components using HTML, Twig, SCSS, JavaScript, and jQuery ensuring WCAG AAA accessibility compliance.

items.title: Full Stack Developer (Intern) | Embifi Pvt. Ltd.
responsibilities: Developed and deployed company website using MERN stack, optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Collaborated with backend team to enhance API performance and integrated server-side data into frontend views improving engagement.
